name: github-search
title: GitHub Search
description: Open the GitHub Search web UI with pre-defined filters
author: webpro

commands.name: search
commands.title: GitHub Search
commands.description: Open the GitHub Search web UI with pre-defined filters

commands.name: run-saved-search
commands.title: Run Saved GitHub Search
commands.description: Quick access to your saved GitHub searches

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
